headline: A Fresh Look at 3M (MMM) Valuation Following Recent Share Price Gains
summary: 3M (MMM) has caught the attention of many investors recently as its share price has shown steady gains. The stock rose 4% in the past week and is up 12% over the past month, which has made some investors question what is behind this upward trend. See our latest analysis for 3M. The momentum behind 3M looks to be building, with a strong 12% share price return over the past month and an impressive 32% total shareholder return over the past year. While there have not been major headline-grabbing...
